#summary Source code

== Command-Line Access ==

Use this command to check out the latest project source code:

{{{
git clone git://git.sympy.org/sympy.git
}}}

== Online access ==

You can browse the repository online here: http://git.sympy.org/?p=sympy.git


==== Legacy ====

The following also works:

{{{
hg clone http://hg.sympy.org/sympy
}}}

and http://hg.sympy.org/sympy


You may also go to the original googlecode [http://code.google.com/p/sympy/source/checkout Source tab].
